alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 07 at 4:26PM EST until March 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30-40 mph with gusts to 65. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland and Indiana Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Preston and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
